TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorBalanceEffect extends System.Drawing.Imaging.Effects.Effect

Docs.summary: Adjusts the color balance of an image.

MemberSignature.Value: public ColorBalanceEffect (int cyanRed, int magentaGreen, int yellowBlue);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 cyanRed, int32 magentaGreen, int32 yellowBlue) cil managed
Public Sub New (cyanRed As Integer, magentaGreen As Integer, yellowBlue As Integer)
new System.Drawing.Imaging.Effects.ColorBalanceEffect : int * int * int -> System.Drawing.Imaging.Effects.ColorBalanceEffect
public: ColorBalanceEffect(int cyanRed, int magentaGreen, int yellowBlue);

param.name: cyanRed
param.para: Integer in the range -100 through 100 that specifies a change in the amount of red in the image. If the value is 0, there is no change. As the value moves from 0 to 100, the amount of red in the image increases and the amount of cyan decreases. As the value moves from 0 to -100, the amount of red in the image decreases and the amount of cyan increases.

param.name: magentaGreen
param.para: Integer in the range -100 through 100 that specifies a change in the amount of green in the image. If the value is 0, there is no change. As the value moves from 0 to 100, the amount of green in the image increases and the amount of magenta decreases. As the value moves from 0 to -100, the amount of green in the image decreases and and the amount of magenta increases.

param.name: yellowBlue
param.para: Integer in the range -100 through 100 that specifies a change in the amount of blue in the image. If the value is 0, there is no change. As the value moves from 0 to 100, the amount of blue in the image increases and the amount of yellow decreases. As the value moves from 0 to -100, the amount of blue in the image decreases and the amount of yellow increases.

Docs.summary: Creates a new with the specified red, green, and blue values.

Docs.summary: Gets the amount of cyanRed in the image.
Docs.value: The value can range from -100 through 100. As the value moves from 0 to 100, the amount of red in the image increases and the amount of cyan decreases. As the value moves from 0 to -100, the amount of red in the image decreases and the amount of cyan increases.

Docs.summary: Gets the amount of yellowBlue in the image.
Docs.value: The value can range from -100 through 100. As the value moves from 0 to 100, the amount of blue in the image increases and the amount of yellow decreases. As the value moves from 0 to -100, the amount of blue in the image decreases and the amount of yellow increases.
